note.p: Education: Newcastle School; Emmanuel College, Cambridge; MB (1745), MD (1750); Leyden
Career: Travelled abroad for some years; Physician to St Bartholomew's Hospital (1754)
References: T E Allibone, 'The Club of the Royal College of Physicians, the Smeatonian Society of Civil Engineers and their Relationship to the Royal Society Club' in NR 1967 vol 22 pp 186-192
Notes: Venn gives date of death as 27 Feb 1772
